<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Crawling Hand](/Monsters.aspx?ID=589)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A crawling hand formed from the appendage of a Medium creature is quick and agile, skittering in the shadows until it can strike its prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Crawling Hand](/Monsters.aspx?ID=589)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 56 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +5; [lifesense 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21), [tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); can't speak any language

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 12 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 8
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Grip Throat**   A Medium or smaller creature that is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the crawling hand has difficulty speaking and must spend an extra action to perform any action with the verbal trait.

**Mark Quarry**   A crawling hand can be assigned a quarry by anointing the hand with a drop of the intended quarry's blood. If the hand ever has no quarry, it automatically gains the next creature it damages as its quarry. The hand gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when it [Seeks](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) its quarry, to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks when it [Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) its quarry, and damage rolls when it Strikes its quarry.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-130" />
name: Crawling Hand
